spec_data.Name: transifex-client
spec_data.Description:
The Transifex Command-line Client is a command line tool that enables
you to easily manage your translations within a project without the
need of an elaborate UI system.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 11:15:26 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command line tool for Transifex translation management
